item.title: Final Test
item.description:
This package is perfect for someone who wants their own custom blog or just needs a simple site without dynamic elements. 'Dynamic elements' are pieces on your website that animate, change appearance, or react to changing conditions. They require more code and are more difficult to develop, but if you're not interested in this kind of stuff, then this package is exactly what you need. These types of sites are easy to maintain without much knowledge of HTML.


Your website will be confined to a single page but can scroll down as far as you like. It can contain links to other sites as well as a contact link to your email address. If you don't need any images on your site, the cost of this package is $60. If you do want images on the site and you can supply me with the images (maximum of 5), the price is $80. If you need custom images and design, please contact me for a price quote.
